subject: AI & Agents
title: AI Can't Do Common Sense
description: A fast breakdown of AI Can't Do Common Sense for builders.

hook.text: Ask AI 'can a crocodile run a steeplechase?' It might analyze the question instead of just laughing.

buildup.text: Common sense requires vast implicit knowledge about physics, society, and everyday experience.

discovery.text: LLMs capture some common sense from text, but physical intuition and social norms often elude them.

twist.text: A child knows a heavy ball will break a glass. AI needs millions of examples to learn what a toddler intuits.

climax.text: The common sense problem is one of AI's oldest unsolved challenges â€” first identified in the 1960s.

punchline.text: Brilliance without common sense. The smartest fool in the room.

quiz.question: Why is common sense so difficult for AI?
options: It requires vast implicit knowledge about physics and everyday experience
AI already has perfect common sense
Common sense can be learned from text alone
